title: PBE
body: Is PBE still available? because if i try and go to the link it pops up with an error, just wondering if its still a thing. PS: First post c:

replies.body: Yes, PBE signups are still available. I recommend [**clearing your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to clear out most errors you'll see on this page. If you continue to see errors, let me know what they say so I can help.
It pops up with error 500 still where it says Somethingâ€™s gone hextechnically wrong.

Ah, so this error usually indicates that there's a routing issue to the page. You may be able to bypass this by using a VPN such as [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us).

Let me know if this worked.
